name: .QRT File Extension
summary: Learn about .QRT files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a QRT file in QuickRoute (Windows). To do so, select File → Open... from the program's menu bar. Then, navigate to and open your QRT file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

images.alt: Screenshot of a .qrt file in QuickRoute 2
images.caption: QRT file open in QuickRoute 2
